ISSUE.TITLE: XCDB migration- displays incorrect meta-sync data
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v14.18.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **sqlite3** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.84.16** - use attached NC v1 noco.db file - migrate to NC v2 - open meta sync tab [noco_apr16.db.zip](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/files/8499505/noco_apr16.db.zip)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: allow editor user to add/remove nested record Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: mark virtual relation columns on migration(v1 => v2) re #1692 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
